Title: Heidelberg on Course for Growth

Title: Changes in the Executive Management Board of Heidelberger Druckmaschinen AG
Description: Marcel Kiessling (age 53), Member of the Executive Management Board for Sales and Services of Heidelberger Druckmaschinen AG (Heidelberg), will leave the company by mutual agreement as of March 31, 2014. Marcel Kiessling worked for Heidelberg since 1989.
